overview: When Reut’s father, Haim, asks her to accompany him to a family event abroad, Reut jumps at the opportunity. Their interaction soon reveals he expects Reut to make an impression. However, Reut realizes she’s nothing like those expectations. The two find themselves stepping on each other’s toes – Haim, who feels that his daughter Reut doesn’t appreciate him or his efforts, while Reut’s confidence is undermined by her father’s criticism. The solution presents itself when Reut meets Dita, a unique hair stylist who helps Reut express herself.
title: Baggage
